mapper.insert: insert into post (title, text, img, member_no, date) values (#{title}, #{text}, #{img}, #{member_no}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.select: select post.*, member.id as member_name, (select count(*) from comment where post_no=post.no) as comment from post left join member on post.member_no = member.no order by post.no desc limit #{limit}, #{contentNo};

select post.*, member.id as member_name, (select count(*) from comment where post_no=post.no) as comment from post left join member on post.member_no = member.no where title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') order by post.no desc limit #{limit}, #{contentNo};
select count(*) from post where title like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%');
mapper.delete: delete from post where no=#{post_no} and member_no=#{member_no};
mapper.update: update post set title=#{title}, text=#{text}, img=#{img}, date=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where no=#{post_no} and member_no=#{member_no};
mapper.select: select id from member where no = #{member_no};
